page.title: 19 EVENTS
page.content:
1.{Bicton Arena}- owned by the Clinton Estates.The arena is open for hire for varying events.Most notable of these are the South West show jumping,hunter trials and three-day events(combining cross-country,dressage & show jumping). See p. 20. Other users of the park have been the Scout & Guide Associations with County camps & "Fun Days".In August,the British Heart Foundation held an Events Day (unfortunately water- logged in this soaking summer).There has also been a"Teddy Bear's picnic". 2.{Vicars Mead}-the extensive gardens of this 15C thatched cottage are open on alternate Sundays throughout the summer.
{All unattributed pages in this block are written by Annmaree Kain & Joan Ross}
